00001 package newtonERP.orm.field;
00002 
00003 import java.util.Collection;
00004 import java.util.Hashtable;
00005 import java.util.Iterator;
00006 import java.util.Vector;
00007 
00008 import newtonERP.module.exception.FieldNotFoundException;
00009 
00015 public class Fields implements Iterable<Field<?>>
00016 {
00017 
00018         Hashtable<String, Field<?>> fieldsDataMap;
00019         Collection<Field<?>> fieldsDataVector;
00020         boolean ErrorState = false;
00021 
00025         public Fields()
00026         {
00027                 fieldsDataMap = new Hashtable<String, Field<?>>();
00028                 fieldsDataVector = new Vector<Field<?>>();
00029         }
00030 
00034         public Fields(Vector<Field<?>> fields)
00035         {
00036                 fieldsDataVector = fields;
00037                 fieldsDataMap = new Hashtable<String, Field<?>>();
00038                 for (Field<?> field : fields)
00039                 {
00040                         if (field.getShortName().matches("PK.*"))
00041                                 field.setReadOnly(true);
00042                         fieldsDataMap.put(field.getShortName(), field);
00043                         field.setFieldsRef(this);
00044                 }
00045         }
00046 
00050         public Collection<Field<?>> getFields()
00051         {
00052                 return fieldsDataVector;
00053         }
00054 
00059         public Field<?> getField(String shortName)
00060         {
00061                 return fieldsDataMap.get(shortName);
00062         }
00063 
00070         public void setData(String shortName, Object data)
00071         {
00072                 try
00073                 {
00074                         if (fieldsDataMap.get(shortName).getCalcul() == null)
00075                                 if (data instanceof String)
00076                                         fieldsDataMap.get(shortName).setData((String) data);
00077                                 else
00078                                         fieldsDataMap.get(shortName).setData(data);
00079                 } catch (NullPointerException e)
00080                 {
00081                         throw new FieldNotFoundException(shortName);
00082                 }
00083         }
00084 
00088         public void setFromHashTable(Hashtable<String, ?> parameters)
00089 
00090         {
00091                 for (String key : parameters.keySet())
00092                 {
00093                         try
00094                         {
00095                                 Object value = parameters.get(key);
00096                                 if (value instanceof String)
00097                                         value = (((String) (value)).replace("&rsquo;", "'"));
00098 
00099                                 setData(key, value);
00100                         } catch (FieldNotFoundException e)
00101                         {
00102                                 // nothing to do
00103                         }
00104                 }
00105         }
00106 
00107         /*
00108          * (non-Javadoc)
00109          * 
00110          * @see java.lang.Object#equals(java.lang.Object)
00111          */
00112         public boolean equals(Object obj)
00113         {
00114                 if (this == obj)
00115                         return true;
00116                 if (obj == null)
00117                         return false;
00118                 if (!(obj instanceof Fields))
00119                         return false;
00120                 Fields other = (Fields) obj;
00121                 if (fieldsDataMap == null)
00122                 {
00123                         if (other.fieldsDataMap != null)
00124                                 return false;
00125                 }
00126                 else if (!fieldsDataMap.equals(other.fieldsDataMap))
00127                         return false;
00128                 if (fieldsDataVector == null)
00129                 {
00130                         if (other.fieldsDataVector != null)
00131                                 return false;
00132                 }
00133                 else if (!fieldsDataVector.equals(other.fieldsDataVector))
00134                         return false;
00135                 return true;
00136         }

00138         public String toString()
00139         {
00140                 return fieldsDataMap.toString();
00141         }
00142 
00146         @Override
00147         public Iterator<Field<?>> iterator()
00148         {
00149                 return fieldsDataVector.iterator();
00150         }
00151 
00155         public Collection<String> getKeyList()
00156         {
00157                 return new Vector<String>(fieldsDataMap.keySet());
00158         }
00159 
00163         public Collection<String> getLongFieldNameList()
00164         {
00165                 Vector<String> longFieldName = new Vector<String>();
00166                 for (Field<?> field : this)
00167                         longFieldName.add(field.getName());
00168                 return longFieldName;
00169         }
00170 
00181         public void setDefaultValue(boolean allField)
00182         {
00183                 for (Field<?> field : getFields())
00184                 {
00185                         if (field.getData() == null || allField)
00186                                 field.setDefaultValue();
00187                 }
00188         }
00189 
00193         public void setDefaultValue()
00194         {
00195                 setDefaultValue(true);
00196         }
00197 
00202         public boolean containsFieldName(String fieldName)
00203         {
00204                 return fieldsDataMap.containsKey(fieldName);
00205         }
00206 
00210         public boolean containsValues()
00211         {
00212                 for (Field<?> field : this)
00213                         if (field.getData() != null)
00214                                 return true;
00215                 return false;
00216         }
00217 
00221         public boolean isErrorState()
00222         {
00223                 return ErrorState;
00224         }
00225 
00229         public void setErrorState(boolean errorState)
00230         {
00231                 ErrorState = errorState;
00232         }
00233 
00237         public void reset()
00238         {
00239                 ErrorState = false;
00240                 for (Field<?> field : fieldsDataVector)
00241                 {
00242                         field.reset();
00243                 }
00244         }
